'''Bradley''' is an [[Unincorporated area|unincorporated community]] located in the town of [[Bradley, Wisconsin|Bradley]], [[Lincoln County, Wisconsin|Lincoln County]], [[Wisconsin]], [[United States]]. Bradley is located on County Highway Y near [[U.S. Route 8]], {{convert|5|mi|km}} north-northwest of [[Tomahawk, Wisconsin|Tomahawk]].
